column4: i've got a server that hangs during fsck on boot. i recognize this is likely a sign of a bigger problem, and i intend to investigate that...but i really need this thing to get up to at least limping along. is there some way to make it skip the fsck?
try to fix it from some live cd imho or edit fstab
turn of disk checking in fstab
if u must but srsly u should fix partitions first or on 80% it will not boot anyway
